extracted_playbook.title: Identify Grafana Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the installed version of Grafana to check if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Grafana version 6.7.0 or later?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Grafana
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Grafana to the latest version to apply the security patches.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Alternative Mitigation Solution
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the alternative mitigation solution provided by Grafana as a temporary measure.
